Text: Internal Trade and PL Cc Wes called me and told me about your desire to remove the MW Brazil trade from the books retroactively The reason given was tax implications I accepted the tax need at face value and want to do what is right for the company However we Remi and I would like to talk to you about the PL implications of doing this I assume we keep the PL on the internal scorecard but need to work out the details on how this gets reflected Thanks Kish

PB Presentation Term Sheet has been executed Cc Here is an update of the Petrobras Marketing Agreement we briefed you on about weeks ago We have executed a term sheet with Petrobras for the terms and conditions described in the updated presentation We also reran the economics based upon what is in the term sheet The term sheet defines the major commerical terms and conditions as well as gives us a day exclusive with Petrobras on the volumes in question The term sheet is in Portuguese We can either discuss this at the tail end of todays Eletrobolt call or can schedule separately Whatever works for you Thanks Kish Forwarded by Joe KishkillSAEnron on AM Ricardo D Cunha PM To Joe nron cc Subject PB Presentation Joe This version has a few minor changes mainly format corrections The main one is the inclusion of a slide describing the sharing mechanism for RC
Petrobras Marketing Agreement Quick Version Cc Attached is a short version of the Petrobras Marketing Agreement update No background etc just the relevant slides that needed to be updated Thanks Kish
Re at on pressing ahead From John J nronXgate on PM CDT To Joe nron cc Subject If we didnt sell any ELP shares over yet Im taking over the execution
Re Cc I was traveling Friday We will be in the market Tuesday From John J nronXgate on PM CDT To Joe nron cc Subject Have we sold any Copel shares yet Have you told Hickerson to sell

RE COPELmore sold above todaywill keep selling per plan Forwarded by Joe KishkillSAEnron on PM Britaldo Soares PM To Joe nron Orlando nron cc Subject RE COPEL FYI Britaldo Forwarded by Britaldo SoaresSAEnron on From John nronXgate on CDT To Britaldo nron cc John UEnronXGate Selena nronXgate David J nronXgate Subject RE COPEL Britaldo Today we sold average Please let us know if you want to continue to sell tomorrow Thankyou John Weakly Original Message From Soares Britaldo Sent Wednesday June AM To Weakly John Cc Soares Britaldo Subject COPEL John As we spoke please go ahead and sell up to ADR Stop selling if price drops to ADR Britaldo

ANSIXQReFWPetrobrFsMTMSensitivitypointthey will be forwarded Kish From John J nronXgate on PM CDT To Joe nron cc Subject FW Petrobrs MTM Sensitivity It would be helpful to have the cases below Original Message From Ishikawa Guy Sent Tuesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Kishkill Joe Collonges Remi Rosenberg David M Wiggs Brett Subject Petrobrs MTM Sensitivity John Please see attached MTM sensitivity for Petrobrs deal Regards Guy Ishikawa

Re Quarterly Business Reviewwe have a QBR scheduled for June It wont hurt my feeling if we dont Thanks Kish Forwarded by Joe KishkillSAEnron on PM John Novak PM To Joe nron cc Orlando nron Subject Re Quarterly Business Review Lance Schuler was asked by Haedicke to sit in on our QBR and thought that one had been scheduled w Skilling during his last visit Joe Kishkill PM To John nron cc Orlando nron Subject Re Quarterly Business Review Not that I am aware ofwhere is this coming from John Novak PM To Orlando nron Joe nron cc Subject Quarterly Business Review Is there a QBR scheduled in June w Skilling and Lavorato Embedded StdOleLink Embedded StdOleLink

COPELWe have sold shares of the MM currently available for sale shares at shares at So liquidity looks pretty good We will continue to liquidate Kish Forwarded by Joe KishkillSAEnron on AM Aneela CT AM To Adarsh CT Susie CT Joe nron Britaldo nron Guy nron cc Donna nronXGate Richard nronXGate Shelli nronXGate Subject COPEL Please find attached the detail of COPEL activity Do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions Regards Aneela
Copel Sharesall goneall MM of themweighted average price of about US per share for the whole lot Kish

Petrobras Sensitivities Cc Attached are the sensitivities on the Petrobras deal you asked for The speadsheet contains three sheets Sheet Pay Out Diagram Sheet Petrobras MTM Sensitivity in which the options shown in the Pay Out Diagram for and are repriced for each move of the forward curve The volatility curve is held constant Sheet Petrobras Intrinsic Value Analysis Price Curve Sensitivities in which volatility is assumed to be zero This represents the value if our price forecast were accurate and the structure with Petrobras were to be finalized as presented Kind of an area under the curves analysis Note In both Sheets the piece is estimated as an area under the curve volatility That is why it does not change If you have any questions please call We will obviously keep you posted as things progress Thanks Kish

Apology for previous emailSorry for the original email below A Portuguese speaker sending emails in English where he should not He has been terminated for reasons unrelated to the email and I consider the issue closed If any doubts please do not hesitate to call Thanks Kish Forwarded by Joe KishkillSAEnron on PM Brett R Wiggs PM To Joe nron cc Subject Urgent Kish Attached is the email from Jorge We are in the process of terminating Jorge due to performance and relation issues We are doing this immediately due to the nature of Jorges job although we were trying to delay until the replacement was in place Given recent actions not the email below we have decided to move forward with the termination this afternoon Brett Forwarded by Brett R WiggsSAEnron on PM Jorge Souza AM To Jeff SkillingCorpEnron cc Brett R nron Miguel nron Subject Urgent Today l am working into SFEOffice to give the instructions to mr Thach C Phan that working into CAA jointly mr Jody pierce l would like to say that mr Joca isnt left to developing my Tasks With Bad Words to my family too Today Mr This is the person that you left to be my chief l woulk like that someone done something l cant working under this orders jorge de souza
